summary: The 6 Times Jonah Almost Kissed Walker, and the 1 Time He Did
body:
The 6 Times Jonah Almost Kissed Walker, and the 1 Time He Did

Part 4: Falling For You(Quite Literally)

Word Count: 143

Pairing(s): Wonah

Genre(s): Fluff

Trigger Warning(s): None

What? Me starting with the climax of the story?

———

“Walker!” Jonah screams as he starts to tumble to the ground, losing his balance on his roller skates.

Walker quickly reaches out, grabbing Jonah’s wrist.

Jonah grabs Walker’s shirt, trying to pull himself up. Instead, he pulls Walker to the ground, landing with a thump. They quickly move to the sidelines, sitting on the ground at the edge of the rink.

“Hey are you okay? I kind of fell on you,” Walker asked, looking into Jonah’s eyes longingly.

“I’m fine,” Jonah responded, looking back into Walker’s eyes, ‘God he is cute. This is the closest I have ever gotten to kissing him. AH JONAH STOP!’

“You sure? You took quite the tumble. I guess you could say you fell for me,” Walker said with a laugh, not noticing the blush dusting Jonah’s features.

“Yeah,” Jonah said, laughing as well.

‘I guess I did.’

Taglist:

| @judgemental-llama | @tyrus-is-endgame-fight-me | @a-bittersweet-gal | @wanna-feel-alive | @emmy2024riggs | @multi-fandom-monkey | @tea-j-kippen |

(Let me know if you want to be added/removed!)

tags: posting some one-shots I already wrote and didn't think I would post
summary: Passing Notes TJ actually didn’t mind study hall. Although it had an infamous reputation for being boring, he enjoyed the extra...
body:
Passing Notes

TJ actually didn’t mind study hall. Although it had an infamous reputation for being boring, he enjoyed the extra reading time it gave him. Study hall also happened to be one of the very few classes he had with Cyrus, which, if he was being honest, was one of the biggest factors in his liking of the class.

He supposed he mostly enjoyed passing notes with Cyrus all class period. Most of the time, they say in desks next to each other so passing was easier, but it didn’t stop them from walking by and dropping notes, passing them through books, or even the occasional paper airplane if they couldn’t find seats together. No matter how it arrived, TJ loved getting the silly notes in Cyrus’ half-cursive scribble. Even the way Cyrus wrote was just so incredibly him that TJ could hear the words in his voice as he read them.

Cyrus always meticulously folded each note, too, so that TJ almost felt bad opening them. He could never help it though, he always liked talking to Cyrus, even in written form. Even if it meant he had to ruin the perfect origami papers that came across his desk.

He was half into his novel for English class, when a cute paper crane landed on his desk in front of him, behind the book. He sighed, looking back at Cyrus who gave him a small shrug and continued to write in his notebook. He turned back and unfolded the crane.

Overheard Katie saying she can’t concentrate when she has chemistry lab with you. Might just have to show up one day and put a screen around you so poor girl can actually focus on her work or something :/

TJ laughed, scribbling “jealous, are we?” 

TJ couldn’t think of any discernible reason why Cyrus wouldn’t like Katie, after all. He refolded the note into quarters and passed it back under the desk. He could hear Cyrus laugh at his folding. He seemed to scribble and fold for what felt like ages, and TJ stared at the book pages as he listened. Maybe Cyrus did like Katie, and he was writing his confession. TJ tried not to feel too disappointed at that, though he couldn’t focus on his novel any longer, his mind choosing to wander to the infinite possibilities where Cyrus and Katie somehow ended up together.

The note came back folded into a tiny, compact envelope. TJ opened it, surprised, or maybe a little relieved, to not find a huge block of text admitting Cyrus’ feelings for Katie.

The reply did shock him, though.

Not jealous. Possibly. I mean, she isn’t really wrong though. You’re pretty cute.

The words had been quite obviously written, erased, and rewritten several times, which was probably why it had taken what felt like years to get the reply. It was more agonizing than texting. TJ stared at the paper, thinking of what this meant, although he was 1200% sure he was over analyzing. He chewed on his lip as he held the paper in front of him. He heard Cyrus quietly clear his throat, but he was too transfixed by the note to look over. He angled it into the sunlight filtering in from the window, seeing if he could make out what was erased, his heart racing. Cyrus cleared his throat again, louder.

“Mr. Kippen?” TJ realized he hadn’t been discreet about his note reading at all. His eyes snapped up. “Would you care to read your note out loud for the class? I’m sure Mr. Goodman is quite the comedian.” TJ could feel all eyes in the room on him, except for Cyrus’. He was probably looking just as embarrassed as TJ was, though he didn’t have the courage to look back and check.

“Um, no thanks, sir.” came TJ’s awkward reply. A few students laughed. TJ’s grip on the sheet of paper tightened, slightly crumpling it with his fingers. They’d have to pry this note out of his cold, dead hands anyway. His notes with Cyrus were always strictly confidential. He prepped for the worst, which was having to eat the note paper.

“I’m sure you’d like a detention, then?” the teacher was now standing up from his seat. He was challenging him, probably trying to make an example.

“Okay.” TJ replied, and a few students gasped. The teacher raised an eyebrow.

“Alright. I’ll get back to you with the time and date, then. Get back to work, both of you.” he said, pointing at TJ before sitting back down in his chair, making a loud creaking noise. TJ would be surprised if he actually got detention for this, but he certainly felt much more like reading his novel, now.

TJ turned and winked at Cyrus behind him as he handed the paper back and picked up his book once again. A few minutes later, another note landed in front of TJ. It was on a smaller piece of paper, just crumpled into a ball.

Thanks for not reading the note. Yikes i’m embarrassed. Hope you don’t actually get detention. I can talk to Jones if you want.

TJ discreetly scribbled his reply, doing the yawn and stretch to drop it in Cyrus’ lap.

Honestly, detention is totally worth it to find out you think I’m “pretty cute”.

Ditto.

summary: can't wait for a few years from now when asher becomes a more mainstream heartthrob following his part in the shazam and the...
body: can’t wait for a few years from now when asher becomes a more mainstream heartthrob following his part in the shazam and the continuation of his music career and his eventual separation from the disney brand just so i can hit the people thirsting over him with this image

blog.name: captainkippen
blog.title: you can be oblivious
blog.description: aaron • he/him • requests are open • fic masterlist • icon by simplycyrus

summary: SEND ME FIC PROMPTS 16. One person pouting, only to have it removed by a kiss from the other person.  34. Kisses that start on...
body:
SEND ME FIC PROMPTS

16. One person pouting, only to have it removed by a kiss from the other person.

34. Kisses that start on their fingers and run up their arm, eventually ending on their lips.

38. Whispering “I love you” before a chaste, delicate kiss.
Kissing tears from the other’s face.

44. Tentative kisses given in the dark.

50. A kiss, followed by more that trail down the jaw and neck.

It’s still dark outside when Cyrus wakes up, though the light from the streetlamp outside glows through the gap in the blinds casting a low light throughout the room. He blinks groggily at the clock on the bedside table - six AM. He groans internally, but he knows that there’s not much point in going back to sleep now, he has to get up in fifteen minutes anyway. It’s always hard to get out of bed on mornings like this, especially when his boyfriend has stayed over. TJ was currently pressed up against his back, one arm slung haphazardly over Cyrus’ waist, snoring gently with his face half smooshed into the pillow. Cyrus doesn’t particularly want to leave the bundle of warmth, but he has to, and when he tries TJ’s grip tightened slightly in his sleep. He sighs and removes TJ’s arm as carefully as he can. The movement clearly isn’t careful enough though because no sooner has he managed to stand up and slide his feet into his slippers, TJ is murmuring something incoherently and pushing himself up into a sitting position.

“Hm?” Cyrus whispers, leaning down to press a soft kiss to his forehead. “Sorry I woke you.”

“It’s fine. What time is it?” TJ rubs his bleary eyes and glances at the alarm clock. When he sees the bright green numbers flashing back at him he makes a loud noise of disgust. “You’re certifiably insane. Why’re you up right now?”

“I have to study.”

Cyrus grabs his towel and rummages through his drawers for something to wear. TJ flops back on to the mattress, exhaling noisily. Cyrus’ eyes don’t need to adjust to the dark to know he’s on the receiving end of an incredulous glare right now.

“You do not,” TJ insists. “You’re the smartest guy in the world. You could ace all your finals in your sleep. Would you please behave like a normal person for once and come back to bed?”

“Can’t. My test is in like… seven hours.”

“And you need seven hours to study for a test you’ve been studying for all week?”

Cyrus puts a hand on his him and fixes TJ with an unimpressed look. “This is important.”

“So’s sleep… you need rest, babe. You’ll burn yourself out if you keep stressing like this,” he reaches out and tugs the hem Cyrus’ pyjama shirt affectionately. “C’mon, Underdog. Five more minutes?”

Darn TJ and his charming smile. The mornings are a weak spot for Cyrus and TJ takes advantage of that regularly knowing he can get his way more easily when Cyrus hasn’t had a chance to wake up properly and is heavily tempted by the prospect of being wrapped in his arms. TJ pulls his hand towards him and places very small fleeting kisses to each of Cyrus’ fingertips. He caves almost instantly. Who is he to try and resist cuddles? He’s only human.

“Fine,” he grumbles, climbing back into bed. “But only five minutes. I’m not letting you throw off my schedule again.”

Last time he’d let that happen he hadn’t had time to get coffee for his trip to the library and his studying time had been cut practically in half. He’d also arrived there so late he couldn’t get a good table. It was a disaster.

Once they’re settled in again, TJ takes Cyrus’ hand and continues his trail of kisses. He presses them lightly all the way up. When he reaches Cyrus’ face he leans back and gives him a tender smile.

“Good morning,” he murmurs. “I love you.”

“I love you too,” Cyrus whispers back and leans in to press a delicate kiss to his lips. They lie there for a while, well over their supposed five minutes more, trading tentative kisses in the dark. Eventually, TJ moves from Cyrus’ mouth and trails his kisses down his jaw to his neck. Cyrus’ lips part in a gasp. He runs his hands up TJ’s back, letting his fingers brush across his broad shoulders, then slides them up to thread his fingers in his hair.

They don’t go back to sleep, and TJ completely throws off Cyrus’ schedule for the rest of the day.

blog.name: lesbi-andi
blog.title: Andi Justice Warrior

tags: i tolerate no peyton hate smh
summary: Peyton is a horrible actor and it kind of ruins my enjoyment of the show. She seems like a wonderful person but sis can’t act...
question: Peyton is a horrible actor and it kind of ruins my enjoyment of the show. She seems like a wonderful person but sis can’t act for shit
answer:
Peyton is actually a rlly good actress esp for someone so young? Like Andi is over dramatic and expressive and that’s how Peyton plays her. Keep in mind Peyton was TWELVE when they were filming season one. She plays Andi very convincingly. Like as someone who studies theatre and has done it for YEARS, she does a very good job of creating who Andi is as a character. And her acting has improved a lot from where it already was.

Also Peyton auditioned for Andi, which was colorblindly casted, and they knew she was the perfect Andi (even thought Terri wanted Andi to be Jewish originally— Peyton was just perfect for the role).

summary:
Have I ever mentioned I was lowkey scared when I saw how much in common I had with Andi Mack and it's character's for example
I...
body:
Have I ever mentioned I was lowkey scared when I saw how much in common I had with Andi Mack and it’s character’s for example

  • I am Cyrus like the embodiment of Cyrus
  • I freaking love lemons and TJ is a lemon
  • I LOVE muffins my favorite are chocolate
  • I had a thing for dinosaurs when I was little
  • I love crafts like Andi
  • Swings I love swinging always have always will and it calms me down

The list goes on but you know I’m gonna leave there you can add to stuff you had in common with the show just curious ✌

blog.name: lovinmullen
blog.title: the love story between two men
blog.description: Leo. he/him. @wanna-feel-alive <3 !!

answer:
95,, do you have a favourite lesbian ship? is it canon?

in this fandom?? ambi, ambi 1000%, aMBI FOR THE WIN. technically no but let’s be honest “don’t worry bambi, i’ll protect you”????? THAT IS PURE LESBIANISM so imma fuck it and say yes.

in general?? sydlena (from odaat) they are the cutest and purest girlfriends in the whole entire world they make my heart melt !!!

96,, what is the most aggravating thing someone has said to you regarding your sexuality?

the first session i ever had with my CAMHS therapist, she asked me about pronouns, preffered name, sexuality, feelings ,,, uno admin type stuff i suppose. when she asked me how i identify. i said a trans male and then she asked me my sexuality “are you attracted to girls, boys, both, more, nothing??” and i replied, girls. then she proceeded to say to me and i quote “yeah but do you genuinely like girls or is it just you trying to cling onto the feeling of being more masculine and binary”

i’ve had plenty more sessions with her now and she’s lovely and helps me so much but that still infuriates me to this day, someone i’m suppose to be abel to confide in and visit once a week, having the audacity to say that to me when i only just met them. i understand that it’s their job to question me, check my boundaries, ect. but i felt that was out of line asking if i pretend to like girls so i can feel more binary male…

96,, what is the most aggravating thing someone has said to you regarding your sexuality?

the first session i ever had with my CAMHS therapist, she asked me about pronouns, preffered name, sexuality, feelings ,,, uno admin type stuff i suppose. when she asked me how i identify. i said a trans male and then she asked me my sexuality “are you attracted to girls, boys, both, more, nothing??” and i replied, girls. then she proceeded to say to me and i quote “yeah but do you genuinely like girls or is it just you trying to cling onto the feeling of being more masculine and binary”

i’ve had plenty more sessions with her now and she’s lovely and helps me so much but that still infuriates me to this day, someone i’m suppose to be abel to confide in and visit once a week, having the audacity to say that to me when i only just met them. i understand that it’s their job to question me, check my boundaries, ect. but i felt that was out of line asking if i pretend to like girls so i can feel more binary male…

trail.content_raw:
95,, do you have a favourite lesbian ship? is it canon?

in this fandom?? ambi, ambi 1000%, aMBI FOR THE WIN. technically no but let’s be honest “don’t worry bambi, i’ll protect you”????? THAT IS PURE LESBIANISM so imma fuck it and say yes.

in general?? sydlena (from odaat) they are the cutest and purest girlfriends in the whole entire world they make my heart melt !!!
